metadata.title: CVE-2024-50091 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:dm vdo: don't refer to dedupe_context after releasing itClear the dedupe_context pointer in a data_vio whenever ownership ofthe context is lost, so that vdo can't examine it accidentally.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-kvm package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
